project(stlplus)

FILE(GLOB LIBSLTPLUS_HPP *.hpp )
FILE(GLOB LIBSLTPLUS_CPP *.cpp )

ADD_LIBRARY(stlplus ${LIBSLTPLUS_HPP} ${LIBSLTPLUS_CPP})

INSTALL(DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}"
    DESTINATION include/third_party/stlplus3
    FILES_MATCHING PATTERN "*.hpp"
    PATTERN "*_test.*" EXCLUDE)
INSTALL(TARGETS stlplus ARCHIVE DESTINATION lib LIBRARY DESTINATION lib)
